狦字的基本解释

狦
shān
恶健犬。
古书上说的一种似狼的野兽。

狦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shān］
［《廣韻》所姦切，平删，生。］
［《廣韻》所晏切，去諫，生。］
(1)恶健犬。
(2)《说文·犬部》：“狦，惡健犬也。”一说是狼。
[②]［shān］
［《集韻》相干切，平寒，心。］
人名用字。

狦字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　狦； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页710第23
【唐韻】【集韻】?所晏切，音訕。【說文】惡健犬也。从犬，?省聲。　又【廣韻】獸名。似狼。　又人名。【前漢·宣帝紀】呼韓邪單于?矦狦來朝。【註】應劭曰：狦，音訕。　又【廣韻】所姦切。【集韻】師姦切，?音?。【廣韻】惡健犬也。　又【博雅】狼也。　又人名。【前漢·?矦狦註】師古：音?。李奇音山。　又【集韻】相干切，音?。漢有單于?矦狦。【漢書註】師古：又音先安反。

狦字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
狦字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Awkward
shān
Evil dogs.
A kind of wolf-like beast said in ancient books.
Awkward
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shān］
[The rape cut in "Guang Yun", flat deleted, raw. ]
["Guangyun" Yan cut, went to admonish, and gave birth. ]
(1) Vicious dogs.
(2) "Shuwen·Canine Department": "You are a bad dog." One said it was a wolf.
[②]［shān］
["Jiyun" is coherent, calm, heart. ]
Use characters for names.

[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Suo Yan cuts, the sound is inconsistent. [Said the text] Evil dogs are also good. From the dog, save the sound.　[Guangyun] The name of the beast. Like a wolf.　Another name. [Previous Han·Xuan Di Ji] Hu Hanxie Shan Yu? Came to the dynasty embarrassingly. [Note] Ying Shao said: 狦，音讪.　 [Guang Yun] cut again by the traitor. [Jiyun] The teacher cuts through the evil spirits, the sound? [Guang Yun] Evil dogs also.　[Bo Ya] Wolf also.　Another name. [Previous Han·?矦狦Note] Shi Gu: Yin?. Li Qiyinshan.　[Jiyun] Coherent, sound?.
